To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Double attack
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Wildrider followed Dead-End up towards Motormaster.

Speedbreaker had to work hard to pull himself up, then he noticed his
comerades, and jumped up soaring to where they were.

"Hha ha ha haha h, the kid gloves are off maximal" screamed Wildrider, the
voice eminating from what was left of his head. "Stunticons, MERGE" Yelled
Motormaster in a commanding tone. With that he flew forwards, and the rest
followed him.

In a circling and complex transformation, Motormaster compacted, and
enlarged a bit, forming a large piece of black metal, with stubs on the
ends. Wildrider and Speedbreaker both transformed into car modes, and then
transformed again, gaining feet, and hooking up to Motormaster. Drag Strip,
and Dead-End both also transformed into car modes, and then transformed
into large arms, joining to Motormaster as well. The large body that had
been formed twirled around, and then after a large eminating light,
transformed, a huge head with horns, and a vacant fave emerged from the
top, as well as armor Transforming all around.

The huge monster of a robot stoped and soared , standing upright, and
hovering in mid air. He was huge, and an awesome form, 45 feet of robot
hovering above the battle field, staring at the combatants on the ground.
"MENASOR" he pronounced his name.

He looked around for a target, and noticed Hot Rod, then looked some more
and noticed Prow. "MENASOR.....CRUSH" he said in a deep booming voice that
could be heard from all around. He raised his arms, and huge barrels
underneath were present. He aimed one arm at Prowl, and the other at Hot
Rod, and Fired, leting huge Plasma energy erupting from both towards the
targets, from the air like raining fire.
